songs.title: CONGRATULATIONS
songs.lyrics:
CONGRATULATIONS




CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel bad
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel that impact
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel this
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel pissed 2x

CONGRATULATIONS  on makin me fel bad i mad


Congaratulations oh god congratulations im just trynna hear most my songs across the nations every body is yo friend till they really start hatin every body is your friend till they really start fakin ok i know i had some friends i had some foes i had a girl i had some hoes but  all them hoes gone be hoes and they come and go and when they leave theres no need in tryin to get that man i know you miss that  and when they hitchu up you boah you bet not hit back im gone you need to listen up or just get back u runnin ya mouth and all i hear is riff raff im just in a mode tho congratulations on bein in go mode congratulations on givin me promos  for all my people ive been trynna make my back fold this shit is getting old tho im trynna be come the goat tho more relevent then the pope hoe im shinin like i am gold you step up  to me ur bold dont do what ur asked do what u is told



CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel bad
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel that impact
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel this
CONGRATULATIONS on makin me feel pissed





Congratulations on makin me feel bad im trynna feel the same way that feel dad when you met my mom did you feel that energy or vibe did you fell the same way i feel inside of my head and my mind im feelin like im blind im feelin like im behind i do not fit in this kind i guess i just have a hard time workin a part time more money more hard times stop the fuckin lyin you ain't had no motha fuckin hard times you is rich bitch u ain't never fuckin lived this gettin mad and pissed while getting dissed while people laugh and joke to you while you reminisce  bout doin this and do that and he was pissed he was mad he was this he was that well congratulations on doin the math  a nigga mad cuz all the shit he want he could never have and he think the only way he could ever make it out is goin out by a by a draft
